DOC.criteria: Aged 1838 year meet DSMIV diagnostic criterion assess use Structured Clinical Interview DSMIV , research version . 1 ) anyone participate clinical trial within 30 day start clinical trial currently participate one , 2 ) anyone progressive disease unstable medical condition unfit trial , 3 ) anyone diagnose psychiatric term past , depend psychotropic substance , overdose depend substance alcohol ( except coffee tobacco ) within 1 month trial start , 4 ) anyone suicidal highly probable suicide , 5 ) anyone test result consider clinically meaningful
